sys_push_notif_msg_content.name: New Approval Notification

sys_update_version.name: sys_push_notif_msg_content_52ff75eedb78505073b6f1fcbf9619be
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_msg_content"><sys_push_notif_msg_content action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>New Approval Notification</name><push_app display_value="ServiceNow Mobile Application">05ed2fb177002300258da2e2c81061c2</push_app><script><![CDATA[(function buildJSON(/*GlideRecord*/ current, /*String*/ message, /*Object*/ attributes) {
    
    var layoutFieldGenerator = new global.NotificationLayoutFieldGenerator();
    var identifier = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "sysapproval");
    var description = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "sysapproval.short_description");
    var status = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "state");
    var json = {};
	
    //Add approval form screens here
	var forms = {
		'sc_req_item': '4669f924db1010d096b0fb37bf9619c7',
	};
	
	var deepLinkGenerator = new global.MobileDeepLinkGenerator("Agent");
	var approvalTable = current.source_table ? current.source_table.toLowerCase() : 'sc_req_item'; // dafault sc_request
    var formScreen = forms[approvalTable];
    var link = deepLinkGenerator.getFormScreenLink(formScreen, current.getTableName(), current.getValue("sys_id"));
   
	json = {
        "aps" : {
            "sound" : "default"
        },
        "Link": link,
        "Layout" : {
            "Status": status,
            "Identifier" : identifier,
            "Description" : description
        }
    };
    
    return json;
    
})(current, message, attributes);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>da837122</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-18 17:41:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>52ff75eedb78505073b6f1fcbf9619be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New Approval Notification</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Tasks" source="x_uocf_tasks">4b2d1f61db88d09096b0fb37bf96190a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Tasks">4b2d1f61db88d09096b0fb37bf96190a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content_52ff75eedb78505073b6f1fcbf9619be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>da837122</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-18 20:34:15</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_msg_content></record_update>
